testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I choose creating new Slideshow from the main dropdown button(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And Slideshow Designer is opened(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When I enter valid information for the question name as "New Question 2"(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When I click the Slideshow Audio File Manager button(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I click the audio file named "Audio_Test.mp3"(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I click the New Pause button(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I drag the new Pause marker 200 pixels right(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I click the New Pause button(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I drag the new Pause marker 600 pixels right(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I click inside the slideshow content in the editor(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible

And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I click OK(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I click on the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question editor(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I drag the Element-In marker 400 pixels right(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When I click to Preview the Slideshow(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I resize the slideshow preview window to the default size(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I am previewing the Slideshow(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When I begin playback of the Slideshow(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When the Slideshow pause bar appears(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I don't see the Mathematical Formula response area(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I don't see How Did I Do on the slide pause bar(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When I click the Continue button on the slide pause bar(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
When the Slideshow pause bar appears(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I see the Mathematical Formula response area(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I see How Did I Do on the slide pause bar(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I enter "2x" in Mathematical Formula input(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
And I click How Did I Do in the Slide(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula answer is correct(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
Then I close the question preview window(Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible
